product_name: DAKINE Low Roller Snowboard Bag - Women's
long_description: The women's DAKINE Low Roller snowboard bag makes transporting your board a breeze, thanks to smooth-rolling wheels, padded construction and separate boot pockets. Fully padded and tarp-lined bag holds multiple unmounted boards or 1 mounted board; fits max board length of 157cm. Full-length, 2-way zippered opening offers easy access to boards; zippers can be locked for added security. Twin exterior zippered pockets stow your boots. Features heavy-duty urethane wheels for easy maneuvering through airports and parking lots; top handle and end carry handles offer multiple hauling options. DAKINE Low Roller snowboard bag is constructed of 600-denier polyester for lightweight, durable protection.
short_description: The women's DAKINE Low Roller snowboard bag makes transporting your board a breeze, thanks to smooth-rolling wheels, padded construction and separate boot pockets.
